activities: OrcaTec prvides electronic discovery and data archiving consulting and technical services to client law firms as well as directly to business organizations who are parties to various types of litigation, investigations, audits and commercial transactions.  OrcaTec processes data for loading into and use with its proprietary advanced document analytics and predictive coding software tools.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
orgverification: 3rd Party by A-lign™ Security and Compliance Servi
personaldata: Client organization data.  Data may include manually processed data.
privacyprograms: AICPA Service Organization Controls 2 (SOC 2) Type 2 - examined in the areas of Privacy, Confidentiality and Security.
recoursemech: OrcaTec has committed to refer unresolved complaints under the US-EU and US-Swiss Safe Harbor Frameworks to an independent dispute resolution mechanism, the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus.
